00013 t_max_err paramui_getName(t_paramui *x, void *attr, long *argc, t_atom **argv)
00014 {
00015         t_symbol        *attrName = (t_symbol*)object_method(attr, _sym_getname);               
00016         return object_attr_getvalueof(x->obj_parameter, attrName, argc, argv);
00017 }
00018 
00019 t_max_err paramui_setName(t_paramui *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00020 {
00021         if(argc)
00022                 x->attr_name = atom_getsym(argv);
00023         
00024         object_attr_setvalueof(x->obj_parameter, gensym("name"), argc, argv);
00025         return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00026 }

00050 
00051 t_max_err paramui_setDefault(t_paramui *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00052 {
00053         x->attr_defaultSize = argc;
00054         if(argc)
00055                 sysmem_copyptr(argv, x->attr_default, sizeof(t_atom) * argc);
00056         object_attr_setvalueof(x->obj_parameter, gensym("default"), argc, argv);
00057         return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00058 }

00147 t_max_err paramui_setRange(t_paramui *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00148 {
00149         if(argc)
00150                 x->attr_range[0] = atom_getfloat(argv+0);
00151         if(argc > 1)
00152                 x->attr_range[1] = atom_getfloat(argv+1);
00153         
00154         object_attr_setvalueof(x->obj_parameter, gensym("range/bounds"), argc, argv);
00155         return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00156 }

00191 t_max_err paramui_getDescription(t_paramui *x, void *attr, long *argc, t_atom **argv)
00192 {
00193         t_symbol        *attrName = (t_symbol*)object_method(attr, _sym_getname);               
00194         return object_attr_getvalueof(x->obj_parameter, attrName, argc, argv);
00195 }
00196 
00197 t_max_err paramui_setDescription(t_paramui *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00198 {
00199         long    textsize = 0;
00200         char    *text = NULL;
00201 
00202         if(argc){
00203                 atom_gettext(argc, argv, &textsize, &text, 0);
00204                 x->attr_description = gensym(text);
00205                 sysmem_freeptr(text);
00206         }
00207         object_attr_setsym(x->obj_parameter, ps_description, x->attr_description);
00208         return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00209 }
